context: Motorola Solutions, Inc. is a communications and analytics company focused on land mobile radio, public safety, and command center software. Mobile phone struggles vs Nokia. Began turnaround.

competitors.name: Nokia
competitors.notes: Market leader with 30% share, colorful consumer phones like 5110 and 3210

competitors.name: Ericsson
competitors.notes: Strong in infrastructure, mobile unit losing money, later merged with Sony
